Name: Royal Gingersnap
Ingredients: 1 whole Maraschino cherry (from jar in syrup)
Instructions: MUDDLE the cherry in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
History: Created by Dale DeGroff, this recipe is adapted from his 2008 book The Essential Cocktail .
Garnish: Cinnamon & sugar rim with orange zest twist (flamed)
